newsitem.title: JAPAN: Nippon Sheet Glass unit to set up firm in China.
newsitem.headline: Nippon Sheet Glass unit to set up firm in China.

text.p: Nippon Sheet Glass Co Ltd said on Tuesday that its subsidiary, Nippon Glass Fiber Co Ltd, would set up a firm in the Chinese city of Tianjin later this month to make glass fibre sheets for use in batteries.
The new firm, Tianjin NGF Glass Fiber Co Ltd, would be capitalised at 800 million yen and have an annual production capacity of 1,200 tonnes, the company said in a statement.
It said the new firm would aim for annual sales of one billion yen after three years in operation.
The company decided on the move as demand for back-up batteries for computers and telecommunication systems was expected to rise in China, the statement said.
